verses.verse: Behold <S%H2005><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> whom I uphold; <S%H8551><s%> my elect, <S%H972><s%> in whom my soul <S%H5315><s%> delights; <S%H7521><s%> I have put <S%H5414><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%> on him: he shall bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> to the Gentiles. <S%H1471><s%>
He shall not cry, <S%H6817><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> lift <S%H5375><s%> up, nor <S%H3808><s%> cause his voice <S%H6963><s%> to be heard <S%H8085><s%> in the street. <S%H2351><s%>

A bruised <S%H7533><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> shall he not break, <S%H7665><s%> and the smoking <S%H3544><s%> flax <S%H6594><s%> shall he not quench: <S%H3518><s%> he shall bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> to truth. <S%H571><s%>

He shall not fail <S%H3543><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> be discouraged, <S%H7533><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> he have set <S%H7760><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> in the earth: <S%H776><s%> and the isles <S%H339><s%> shall wait <S%H3176><s%> for his law. <S%H8451><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> God <S%H410><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> he that created <S%H1254><s%> the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and stretched <S%H5186><s%> them out; he that spread <S%H7554><s%> forth the earth, <S%H776><s%> and that which comes <S%H6631><s%> out of it; he that gives <S%H5414><s%> breath <S%H5397><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> on it, and spirit <S%H7307><s%> to them that walk <S%H1980><s%> therein:

I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have called <S%H7121><s%> you in righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and will hold <S%H2388><s%> your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and will keep <S%H5341><s%> you, and give <S%H5414><s%> you for a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> for a light <S%H216><s%> of the Gentiles; <S%H1471><s%>

To open <S%H6491><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> eyes, <S%H5869><s%> to bring <S%H3318><s%> out the prisoners <S%H616><s%> from the prison, <S%H4525><s%> and them that sit <S%H3427><s%> in darkness <S%H2822><s%> out of the prison <S%H3608><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

I am the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> that is my name: <S%H8034><s%> and my glory <S%H3519><s%> will I not give <S%H5414><s%> to another, <S%H312><s%> neither my praise <S%H8416><s%> to graven <S%H6456><s%> images.

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the former <S%H7223><s%> things are come <S%H935><s%> to pass, and new <S%H2319><s%> things do I declare: <S%H5046><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> they spring <S%H6779><s%> forth I tell <S%H8085><s%> you of them.

Sing <S%H7891><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song, <S%H7892><s%> and his praise <S%H8416><s%> from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> you that go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and all <S%H4393><s%> that is therein; <S%H4393><s%> the isles, <S%H339><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> thereof.

Let the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof lift <S%H5375><s%> up their voice, the villages <S%H2691><s%> that Kedar <S%H6938><s%> does inhabit: <S%H3427><s%> let the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the rock <S%H5553><s%> sing, <S%H7442><s%> let them shout <S%H6681><s%> from the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>
Let them give <S%H7760><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and declare <S%H5046><s%> his praise <S%H8416><s%> in the islands. <S%H339><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> as a mighty <S%H1368><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> he shall stir <S%H5782><s%> up jealousy <S%H7068><s%> like a man <S%H376><s%> of war: <S%H4421><s%> he shall cry, <S%H7321><s%> yes, <S%H637><s%> roar; <S%H6873><s%> he shall prevail <S%H1396><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> his enemies. <S%H341><s%>

I have long <S%H5769><s%> time held <S%H2814><s%> my peace; <S%H2814><s%> I have been still, <S%H2790><s%> and refrained <S%H662><s%> myself: now will I cry <S%H6463><s%> like a travailing <S%H3205><s%> woman; I will destroy <S%H5395><s%> and devour <S%H7602><s%> at <S%H3162><s%> once. <S%H3162><s%>

I will make <S%H7760><s%> waste <S%H2717><s%> mountains <S%H2022><s%> and hills, <S%H1389><s%> and dry <S%H3001><s%> up all <S%H3605><s%> their herbs; <S%H6212><s%> and I will make <S%H7760><s%> the rivers <S%H5103><s%> islands, <S%H339><s%> and I will dry <S%H3001><s%> up the pools. <S%H98><s%>

And I will bring <S%H3212><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> by a way <S%H1870><s%> that they knew <S%H3045><s%> not; I will lead <S%H1869><s%> them in paths <S%H5410><s%> that they have not known: <S%H3045><s%> I will make <S%H7760><s%> darkness <S%H4285><s%> light <S%H216><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, and crooked <S%H4625><s%> things straight. <S%H4334><s%> These <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> will I do <S%H6213><s%> to them, and not forsake <S%H5800><s%> them.

They shall be turned <S%H5472><s%> back, <S%H268><s%> they shall be greatly ashamed, <S%H954><s%> that trust <S%H982><s%> in graven <S%H6459><s%> images, that say <S%H559><s%> to the molten <S%H4541><s%> images, You are our gods. <S%H430><s%>
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> you deaf; <S%H2795><s%> and look, <S%H5027><s%> you blind, <S%H5787><s%> that you may see. <S%H7200><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is blind, <S%H5787><s%> but my servant? <S%H5650><s%> or deaf, <S%H2795><s%> as my messenger <S%H4397><s%> that I sent? <S%H7971><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> is blind <S%H5787><s%> as he that is perfect, <S%H7999><s%> and blind <S%H5787><s%> as the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> servant? <S%H5650><s%>
Seeing <S%H7200><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> things, but you observe <S%H8104><s%> not; opening <S%H6491><s%> the ears, <S%H241><s%> but he hears <S%H8085><s%> not.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is well <S%H2654><s%> pleased <S%H2654><s%> for his righteousness' <S%H6664><s%> sake; <S%H4616><s%> he will magnify <S%H1431><s%> the law, <S%H8451><s%> and make it honorable. <S%H142><s%>

But this <S%H1931><s%> is a people <S%H5971><s%> robbed <S%H962><s%> and spoiled; <S%H8154><s%> they are all <S%H3605><s%> of them snared <S%H6351><s%> in holes, <S%H2356><s%> and they are hid <S%H2244><s%> in prison <S%H3608><s%> houses: <S%H1004><s%> they are for a prey, <S%H957><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> delivers; <S%H5337><s%> for a spoil, <S%H4933><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Restore. <S%H7725><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> among you will give ear <S%H238><s%> to this? <S%H2063><s%> who will listen <S%H7181><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> for the time <S%H268><s%> to come?

Who <S%H4310><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for a spoil, <S%H4882><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> to the robbers? <S%H962><s%> did not the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> he against whom <S%H2098><s%> we have sinned? <S%H2398><s%> for they would <S%H14><s%> not walk <S%H1980><s%> in his ways, <S%H1870><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> were they obedient <S%H8085><s%> to his law. <S%H8451><s%>

Therefore he has poured <S%H8210><s%> on him the fury <S%H2534><s%> of his anger, <S%H639><s%> and the strength <S%H5807><s%> of battle: <S%H4421><s%> and it has set <S%H7760><s%> him on fire <S%H3857><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about, yet he knew <S%H3045><s%> not; and it burned <S%H1197><s%> him, yet he laid <S%H7760><s%> it not to heart. <S%H3820><s%>
